https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zdwcvSX4imLaGlKuQ3qiNnaByD2.jpg Four separate narratives weave their way together in this impactful drama, from the harrowing slums of Bogot√° to the hills of Hollywood. A 14-year-old street girl and an American writer discover an uncommon union, a day-care teacher in Los Angeles does everything she can to fight the weight of a tragic secret and a university student invites a terrible danger into her world. Starring Rachel Leigh Cook, Daniel Gillies and Seymour Cassell. Broken Kingdom
